access: Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diver's Gloves](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2461)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 85</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn gloves

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Second-mark members of the Firebrands have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These black leather gloves fit snuggly, running up the length of your arm to your elbow. Each glove has an angular fin running along the outside edge of your arms, which forms a narrow triangle when your hands meet in a diving position. While wearing the gloves, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39).

<document level="2" id="action-2016" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Diver's Gloves (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 85</row>

**Price** 85 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Diver's Gloves (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 85</row>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +2. The gloves grant you a swim Speed equal to half of your land Speed.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Diver's Gloves (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 85</row>

**Price** 6,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus is +3. The gloves grant you a swim Speed equal to your land Speed or 30 feet, whichever is higher.
name: Diver's Gloves (Lesser)
